channel.title: Company Legal & Law Matters on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Company Legal & Law Matters on TechnoStreet

item.title: Minnesota and DC sue Target-owned Shipt delivery service for worker misclassification
item.description: Minnesota and DC sue Target-owned Shipt delivery service for worker misclassification The Minnesota and District of Columbia attorneys general are suing Target-owned Shipt delivery service over worker misclassification, CBS News has reported.

item.title: iPhones will get USB-C charging to comply with EU law, Apple SVP confirms
item.description: iPhones will get USB-C charging to comply with EU law, Apple SVP confirms When the European Parliament voted in favor of making USB-C the common charging standard in the region, it was pretty obvious which company was going to be the most affected by the mandate.
